description: Behaviors that create visual, audio, and gameplay effects

loop3dsound.name: Loop 3D Sound
loop3dsound.description: Creates a 3D positional sound that loops continuously with volume based on player distance. The sound volume adjusts smoothly between minimum and maximum values as the player moves closer or further away.

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Maximum distance at which the sound can be heard

properties.name: MINVOLUME
properties.description: Minimum volume level when player is at maximum range

properties.name: MAXVOLUME
properties.description: Maximum volume level when player is closest

properties.name: ACTIVATE_AT_START
properties.description: Whether to start playing the sound immediately. If unchecked, requires a switch or zone trigger to activate.

ambience.name: Ambience
ambience.description: When activated will change ambience to the required settings. Secondary activation will return ambience to default settings. Can be triggered by a switch or multi-trigger zone.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when ambience changes

properties.name: AMBIENCE_R
properties.description: Red component of ambient light

properties.name: AMBIENCE_G
properties.description: Green component of ambient light

properties.name: AMBIENCE_B
properties.description: Blue component of ambient light

properties.name: EXPOSURE
properties.description: Exposure level for the ambient lighting

features: Toggle between custom and default ambience

emission_control.name: Emission Control
emission_control.description: Controls the emissive properties of an object, allowing for dynamic control of glow effects with customizable colors, strength, and fade transitions.

properties.name: OFF_STRENGTH
properties.description: Emission strength when deactivated

properties.name: ON_STRENGTH
properties.description: Emission strength when activated

properties.name: FADE_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of transition between states

properties.name: COLOR_R
properties.description: Red component of emission color

properties.name: COLOR_G
properties.description: Green component of emission color

properties.name: COLOR_B
properties.description: Blue component of emission color

game_monitor.name: Game Monitor
game_monitor.description: Monitors a User Global Value and launches designated game actions when the value reaches a specified threshold. Can trigger win game, lose game, or level transitions based on global variable values.

properties.name: USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: User Global used to monitor (e.g., MyPoints)

properties.name: TRIGGER_VALUE
properties.description: Value to trigger action

properties.name: TRIGGER_ACTION
properties.description: Action to take when trigger value is reached

properties.name: GoToLevelMode
properties.description: Controls whether to load the next level in the Storyboard, or a specific level

pulsecontrol.name: Pulse Control
pulsecontrol.description: Modifies the emissiveness of an object when activated by zone, switch, or set to ON. Features three modes: increase emission, decrease emission, and pulse emission with customizable colors and speeds.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when pulse control is activated

properties.name: MODE
properties.description: How the emission should behave

properties.name: LEVEL
properties.description: Target emission level

properties.name: SPEED
properties.description: Speed of emission change

properties.name: SET
properties.description: Initial state of the pulse control

properties.name: COLOR_CHANGE
properties.description: Whether to change emission color during pulsing

properties.name: COLOR_R
properties.description: Red component of emission color

properties.name: COLOR_G
properties.description: Green component of emission color

properties.name: COLOR_B
properties.description: Blue component of emission color

random_sound.name: Random Sound
random_sound.description: Plays one of four random sound resources when the player enters a zone. Features configurable zone height detection and automatic sound selection from multiple audio slots.

properties.name: ZONEHEIGHT
properties.description: How far above the zone the player can be before the zone is not triggered

shake.name: Shake
shake.description: Creates camera shake effects with six predefined styles and manual customization options. Can be triggered by zones or switches with configurable intensity, period, and fade settings.

properties.name: STYLE
properties.description: Predefined shake style or manual mode

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text shown when shake is activated

properties.name: TRAUMA
properties.description: Shake trauma intensity (for manual mode)

properties.name: PERIOD
properties.description: Shake period in milliseconds (for manual mode)

properties.name: FADE
properties.description: Shake fade rate (for manual mode)

properties.name: BACKGROUND_TRAUMA
properties.description: Background shake trauma (for manual mode)

properties.name: BACKGROUND_PERIOD
properties.description: Background shake period (for manual mode)

properties.name: MODE
properties.description: Whether shake happens once or continuously

timed_event.name: Timed Event
timed_event.description: Activates timed delayed linked events with configurable delays and event counts. Perfect for creating sequences, countdowns, and multi-stage triggers with sound effects and visual feedback.

properties.name: EVENT_TEXT
properties.description: Text to display when event is activated

properties.name: EVENT_COUNT
properties.description: Number of events to trigger

properties.name: EVENT_DELAY
properties.description: Delay between events in seconds

properties.name: VISIBILITY
properties.description: Whether to hide or show the object during events

underwater.name: Underwater
underwater.description: Changes the LUT (Look-Up Table) and water color when the player is submerged underwater. Automatically detects underwater state and applies visual effects for immersive underwater environments.

properties.name: LUT_GROUP
properties.description: LUT group to change to when underwater (without .png extension)

properties.name: CHANGE_COLOR
properties.description: Whether to change water color when underwater

properties.name: WATER_COLOR_R
properties.description: Red component of underwater water color

properties.name: WATER_COLOR_G
properties.description: Green component of underwater water color

properties.name: WATER_COLOR_B
properties.description: Blue component of underwater water color

arcade_mode.name: Arcade Mode
arcade_mode.description: Creates an arcade-style gameplay mode by modifying player movement and controls. Features automatic forward movement, restricted view angles, and customizable control limitations.

properties.name: Z_MOVE_SPEED
properties.description: Forward auto-movement speed

properties.name: X_MOVE_RANGE
properties.description: Maximum lateral movement range

properties.name: HORIZONTAL_VIEW_LIMIT
properties.description: Maximum horizontal view angle

properties.name: VERTICAL_VIEW_LIMIT
properties.description: Maximum vertical view angle

properties.name: ALLOW_RUNNING
properties.description: Whether player can run

properties.name: ALLOW_JUMPING
properties.description: Whether player can jump

properties.name: ALLOW_REVERSE
properties.description: Whether player can move backward

properties.name: HIDE_WEAPON
properties.description: Whether to hide weapon model

properties.name: HIDE_WEAPONFIRE
properties.description: Whether to hide weapon firing effects

properties.name: USE_CROSSHAIR
properties.description: Whether to show crosshair

properties.name: CROSSHAIR_IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Path to crosshair image file

properties.name: USING_PLATFORM
properties.description: Whether to use platform for movement

properties.name: PLATFORM_NAME
properties.description: Name of platform entity to use for movement

steps: Set up platform movement if needed

fadeinsound.name: Fade In Sound
fadeinsound.description: Plays a sound that gradually increases in volume as the player approaches, with configurable range and volume levels. Perfect for creating dynamic ambient sounds that respond to player proximity.

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Maximum distance at which the sound can be heard

properties.name: MINVOLUME
properties.description: Minimum volume level when player is at maximum range

properties.name: MAXVOLUME
properties.description: Maximum volume level when player is closest

fadeoutsound.name: Fade Out Sound
fadeoutsound.description: Plays a sound that gradually decreases in volume as the player approaches, with configurable range and volume levels. Perfect for creating dynamic ambient sounds that fade away when the player gets closer.

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Maximum distance at which the sound can be heard

properties.name: MINVOLUME
properties.description: Minimum volume level when player is closest

properties.name: MAXVOLUME
properties.description: Maximum volume level when player is at maximum range

fog.name: Fog
fog.description: Creates a dynamic fog system that can be triggered to change fog settings between default and custom values. Perfect for creating atmospheric transitions and environmental effects.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when fog settings are changing

properties.name: FOG_NEAREST
properties.description: Distance where fog begins to appear

properties.name: FOG_DISTANCE
properties.description: Distance where fog reaches maximum density

properties.name: FOG_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of fog transition between states

game_clock.name: Game Clock
game_clock.description: Creates a global game clock that can be used by other scripts or displayed in-game. Provides time tracking with configurable display options and global time variables.

properties.name: DISPLAY_CLOCK
properties.description: Whether to display the clock on screen

properties.name: DISPLAY_TYPE
properties.description: Time display format

properties.name: DISPLAY_X
properties.description: X position of clock display

properties.name: DISPLAY_Y
properties.description: Y position of clock display

properties.name: DISPLAY_TEXT_SIZE
properties.description: Size of clock text

properties.name: START_HOURS
properties.description: Starting hour

properties.name: START_MINUTES
properties.description: Starting minute

properties.name: START_SECONDS
properties.description: Starting second

features: Global time variables for other scripts

event_manager.name: Event Manager
event_manager.description: A global behavior that manages timed, delayed, or random linked events with IfUsed link support. Perfect for creating complex event sequences and coordinated behaviors.

properties.name: EVENT_MODE
properties.description: How events are triggered

properties.name: EVENT0_LINK
properties.description: Link number for first event

properties.name: EVENT0_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before first event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT1_LINK
properties.description: Link number for second event

properties.name: EVENT1_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before second event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT2_LINK
properties.description: Link number for third event

properties.name: EVENT2_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before third event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT3_LINK
properties.description: Link number for fourth event

properties.name: EVENT3_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before fourth event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT4_LINK
properties.description: Link number for fifth event

properties.name: EVENT4_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before fifth event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT5_LINK
properties.description: Link number for sixth event

properties.name: EVENT5_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before sixth event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT6_LINK
properties.description: Link number for seventh event

properties.name: EVENT6_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before seventh event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT7_LINK
properties.description: Link number for eighth event

properties.name: EVENT7_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before eighth event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT8_LINK
properties.description: Link number for ninth event

properties.name: EVENT8_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before ninth event in milliseconds

properties.name: EVENT9_LINK
properties.description: Link number for tenth event

properties.name: EVENT9_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before tenth event in milliseconds

properties.name: REPEAT_EVENTS
properties.description: Number of times to repeat the event sequence

properties.name: REPEAT_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before sequence repeats in milliseconds

properties.name: RANDOM_MODIFIER
properties.description: Modifies random interval timing

properties.name: IFUSED_EVENT
properties.description: Whether to activate an IfUsed link

properties.name: IFUSED_DELAY
properties.description: Delay before IfUsed activation in milliseconds

properties.name: ACTIVATED
properties.description: Whether to start activated or wait for trigger

features: Up to 10 linked events with individual delays

gibs.name: Gibs
gibs.description: Will randomly gib a weakened character in range when their health is low. Creates physics-enabled debris and blood splats when triggered.

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Maximum distance at which the gib effect can be triggered

properties.name: GIB1_NAME
properties.description: Name of first gib object

properties.name: GIB2_NAME
properties.description: Name of second gib object

properties.name: GIB3_NAME
properties.description: Name of third gib object

properties.name: GIB4_NAME
properties.description: Name of fourth gib object

properties.name: GIB5_NAME
properties.description: Name of fifth gib object

properties.name: GIB6_NAME
properties.description: Name of sixth gib object

properties.name: SPLAT_NAME
properties.description: Name of blood splat object

properties.name: LIFESPAN
properties.description: Time in seconds before gibs are cleaned up

properties.name: CLEANUP
properties.description: How gibs are removed. Instant removes them immediately, Discrete fades them out gradually.

properties.name: GLOBAL_ENABLED
properties.description: Enable gibbing for non-CC based characters

glow.name: Glow
glow.description: Creates a pulsing glow effect by varying the emissive strength of an object between minimum and maximum values at a configurable speed.

properties.name: MINRANGE
properties.description: Minimum emissive strength value

properties.name: MAXRANGE
properties.description: Maximum emissive strength value

properties.name: SPEEDOFCHANGE
properties.description: Speed at which the emissive strength changes

properties.name: ActiveAtStart
properties.description: Whether the glow effect starts automatically. If unchecked, requires a switch or zone trigger to activate.

features: Configurable minimum and maximum glow levels
Random direction changes for natural variation

light_mover.name: Light Mover
light_mover.description: Allows a light to be attached to a moving object with configurable offsets and light behavior modes.

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to attach the light to

properties.name: ADJUST_X_OFFSET
properties.description: X-axis offset from the object's position

properties.name: ADJUST_Y_OFFSET
properties.description: Y-axis offset from the object's position

properties.name: ADJUST_Z_OFFSET
properties.description: Z-axis offset from the object's position

properties.name: LIGHT_TYPE
properties.description: Behavior mode of the light. Rotating type requires a spotlight.

properties.name: LIGHT_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of light behavior (flashing or rotation)

properties.name: LIGHT_ON
properties.description: Whether the light starts in the on state

properties.name: HIDE_OBJECT
properties.description: Whether to hide the attached object

features: Support for spotlights in rotating mode

lightcontrol.name: Light Control
lightcontrol.description: Ramps the strength distance of a light up or down when activated by a zone, switch, or by range. Can also control emissive textures of objects.

properties.name: RANGE_SENSING
properties.description: How the light is activated. Yes = by range, No = by switch/zone, None-Light On = always on

properties.name: SENSOR_RANGE
properties.description: Maximum distance at which the light activates when using range sensing

properties.name: MAX_LIGHT_DISTANCE
properties.description: Maximum light range when fully activated

properties.name: SPEED
properties.description: Speed at which the light ramps up or down

properties.name: MODE
properties.description: Behavior mode when activated. Overpower mode will destroy the light after reaching maximum intensity.

properties.name: LIGHT_R
properties.description: Red component of light color (used in Change Color mode)

properties.name: LIGHT_G
properties.description: Green component of light color (used in Change Color mode)

properties.name: LIGHT_B
properties.description: Blue component of light color (used in Change Color mode)

properties.name: FLICKER
properties.description: Flickering behavior. Startup = flickers when turning on, Random = continuous random flickering

properties.name: LIGHT_OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of object to control emissive texture (if any)

live_emitter.name: Live Emitter
live_emitter.description: Attached object can monitor a named object's health and pulse its emissive texture, and run any inbuilt named animation in response to being hurt.

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to monitor for health changes

properties.name: PULSE_STRENGTH
properties.description: Maximum emissive strength when pulsing

properties.name: PULSE_SPEED
properties.description: Speed at which the emissive strength changes

properties.name: PULSE_DECAY
properties.description: Time in milliseconds before the emissive strength starts to decay

properties.name: IDLE_ANIMATION
properties.description: Animation to play when idle (case sensitive)

properties.name: PULSE_ANIMATION
properties.description: Animation to play when pulsing (case sensitive)

features: Animation support for idle and pulse states

atlas_cycler.name: Atlas Cycler
atlas_cycler.description: Cycles through frames of an atlas texture on an object with configurable speed and display modes. Can be activated from a trigger or switch or set to always on.

properties.name: IMAGEFILE
properties.description: Atlas texture file to cycle through

properties.name: DISPLAY_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of frame transitions in milliseconds

properties.name: ATLAS_COLUMNS
properties.description: Number of columns in the atlas texture grid

properties.name: ATLAS_ROWS
properties.description: Number of rows in the atlas texture grid

properties.name: EMISSIVE_STRENGTH
properties.description: Brightness of the emissive texture effect

properties.name: DISPLAY_MODE
properties.description: Whether to loop continuously or play once

properties.name: ALWAYS_ON
properties.description: Whether the effect is always active

change_texture.name: Change Texture
change_texture.description: Creates a dynamic texture system that can switch between two textures with support for UV manipulation, atlas animation, and emissive effects. Features scrolling textures, frame-based animation, and PBR material integration.

properties.name: IMAGEFILE1
properties.description: Primary texture file path

properties.name: IMAGEFILE2
properties.description: Alternative texture file path

properties.name: TEXTURE_SCALE_U
properties.description: Horizontal texture scale

properties.name: TEXTURE_SCALE_V
properties.description: Vertical texture scale

properties.name: TEXTURE_OFFSET_U
properties.description: Horizontal texture offset

properties.name: TEXTURE_OFFSET_V
properties.description: Vertical texture offset

properties.name: SCROLL_DIRECTION_U
properties.description: Horizontal scroll direction

properties.name: SCROLL_DIRECTION_V
properties.description: Vertical scroll direction

properties.name: TEXTURE_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of texture animation/scrolling

properties.name: ATLAS_TEXTURE_ROWS
properties.description: Number of rows in texture atlas

properties.name: ATLAS_TEXTURE_COLUMNS
properties.description: Number of columns in texture atlas

properties.name: MATERIAL1_EMISSIVE_STRENGTH
properties.description: Emissive strength for primary texture

properties.name: MATERIAL2_EMISSIVE_STRENGTH
properties.description: Emissive strength for alternative texture

properties.name: EMISSIVE_STRENGTH_VARIANCE
properties.description: Random variation in emissive strength

steps: Attach the change_texture behavior to an object
Set up primary and alternative texture files
Configure UV scale and offset if needed
Set up scrolling direction and speed if desired
Configure atlas dimensions for frame animation
Adjust emissive properties for glow effects
Create logic connections for texture switching

corpse_fader.name: Corpse Fader
corpse_fader.description: Creates an automatic corpse management system that gradually fades out and removes dead entities. Features configurable delay before fading starts and customizable fade duration for smooth transitions.

properties.name: FADE_DELAY
properties.description: Seconds to wait after death before starting fade

properties.name: FADE_TIME
properties.description: Duration in seconds for the fade effect

steps: Attach the corpse_fader behavior to an object
Configure FADE_DELAY for time before fading starts
Test with different entities to ensure proper fading
Verify proper cleanup of removed entities

decal_facing.name: Decal Facing
decal_facing.description: Creates a decal that automatically faces the player camera at all times, ensuring maximum visibility from any angle. Perfect for creating dynamic visual elements that always remain oriented toward the player.

properties.name: No editable properties
properties.description: This behavior is fully self-contained with no configurable properties.

steps: Create or select a decal object

atmosphere.name: Atmosphere
atmosphere.description: Creates atmospheric effects like fog, rain, snow, and wind. Can be configured to change over time and respond to player actions.

properties.name: FOG_ENABLED
properties.description: Enable fog effect

properties.name: FOG_START
properties.description: Distance at which fog begins

properties.name: FOG_END
properties.description: Distance at which fog becomes fully opaque

properties.name: FOG_COLOR
properties.description: RGB color of the fog (values from 0-1)

properties.name: RAIN_ENABLED
properties.description: Enable rain effect

properties.name: RAIN_INTENSITY
properties.description: Intensity of the rain effect

properties.name: SNOW_ENABLED
properties.description: Enable snow effect

properties.name: SNOW_INTENSITY
properties.description: Intensity of the snow effect

properties.name: WIND_ENABLED
properties.description: Enable wind effect

properties.name: WIND_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of the wind effect

properties.name: WIND_DIRECTION
properties.description: Direction of the wind in degrees

decalshow.name: Decal Show
decalshow.description: Creates a decal that appears when activated from a linked trigger zone or switch, with configurable positioning, display duration, and fade effects. Perfect for creating temporary visual indicators, waypoints, or contextual markers that appear and disappear with customizable timing and transitions.

properties.name: Style
properties.description: How the decal behaves in the world

properties.name: X Adjustment
properties.description: Horizontal position adjustment

properties.name: Y Adjustment
properties.description: Vertical position adjustment

properties.name: Z Adjustment
properties.description: Distance adjustment

properties.name: Display Time
properties.description: Duration decal remains visible in seconds

properties.name: Fade In Speed
properties.description: Speed of fade in effect

properties.name: Fade Out Speed
properties.description: Speed of fade out effect

properties.name: Drift Amount
properties.description: Amount of vertical drift for drift styles

features: Five different style modes for decal behavior
Vertical drift options with random variation

steps: Create or select a decal object
Create trigger zone or switch for activation

fadecontrol.name: Fade Control
fadecontrol.description: Controls the transparency of an object when activated by a trigger zone or switch. Can either increase or decrease visibility with configurable speed and final level. Perfect for creating objects that fade in or out based on player interaction.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when fade effect starts

properties.name: MODE
properties.description: Whether the object becomes more or less visible

properties.name: LEVEL
properties.description: Final transparency level (100 = fully visible, 0 = invisible)

properties.name: SPEED
properties.description: Speed of fade transition

features: Automatic cleanup when fully faded out

steps: Create trigger zone or switch for activation

grow.name: Grow
grow.description: Makes an object grow in size when activated by proximity or trigger zone. Can grow along specific axes or all at once, with configurable speed and final scale. Perfect for creating objects that expand or transform based on player interaction.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when growth effect starts

properties.name: ACTIVATION_RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which the object starts growing

properties.name: GROW_MODE
properties.description: Which axes the object grows along

properties.name: GROW_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of growth effect

properties.name: GROW_SCALE
properties.description: Final scale multiplier

features: Configurable growth axes (X, Y, Z, or all)

hidden.name: Hidden
hidden.description: A global behavior that hides all objects with the same name in-game. Objects to be hidden must be set as dynamic (Physics ON, IsImobile ON). Provides control over collision and navmesh blocking.

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of objects to hide (case insensitive)

properties.name: COLLISION_MODE
properties.description: Whether to enable collision for hidden objects

properties.name: NAVMESH_BLOCK
properties.description: Whether to block navmesh at hidden object locations

steps: Create or select an object to control hiding
Set the object name to match objects you want to hide

hideshow.name: HideShow
hideshow.description: Hides or shows an object when activated from a linked trigger zone or switch. Supports instant and fade transitions, with configurable delay and fade speed. Includes sound effects and optional prompt messages.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when object is hidden/shown

properties.name: MODE
properties.description: How the object should be hidden or shown

properties.name: DELAY
properties.description: Delay in seconds before hiding/showing

properties.name: FADE_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of fade transition (for fade modes)

steps: Create or select an object to hide/show
Link to a trigger zone or switch

hideshow_named.name: HideShow Named
hideshow_named.description: Hides or shows a named object when this object is activated from a linked trigger zone or switch. Supports instant and fade transitions, with configurable delay and fade speed. Includes sound effects and optional prompt messages.

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to hide/show (case insensitive)

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when object is hidden/shown

properties.name: MODE
properties.description: How the object should be hidden or shown

properties.name: DELAY
properties.description: Delay in seconds before hiding/showing

properties.name: FADE_SPEED
properties.description: Speed of fade transition (for fade modes)

steps: Create or select a control object
Set the name of the object to control
Link to a trigger zone or switch

hologram.name: Hologram
hologram.description: Creates a holographic effect that can be activated by a switch. Supports fixed and growing holograms with optional rotation and beam effects. Includes emissive glow and sound effects.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when hologram is displayed

properties.name: HOLOGRAM_MODE
properties.description: Type of hologram effect

properties.name: HOLOGRAM_ROTATION
properties.description: Rotation speed of the hologram

properties.name: HOLOGRAM_NAME
properties.description: Name of the hologram object

properties.name: HOLOBEAM_NAME
properties.description: Name of the holobeam object (optional)

properties.name: SWITCHED
properties.description: Start switched on or off

steps: Create or select a control object

hover.name: Hover
hover.description: Makes an object hover up and down along its Y axis with configurable height, speed, and activation options. Can be controlled by a variable switch for dynamic speed adjustment.

properties.name: HOVER_HEIGHT
properties.description: Height of hover movement

properties.name: LOWER_HEIGHT
properties.description: Base height from ground

properties.name: SPEED
properties.description: Speed of hover movement

properties.name: ACTIVE_AT_START
properties.description: Start hovering immediately (uncheck to use switch/trigger)

properties.name: USE_VARIABLE_SWITCH
properties.description: Use a variable switch to control speed

properties.name: VARIABLE_SWITCH_USER_GLOBAL
properties.description: Name of the variable switch to use

steps: Create or select an object to hover

invisible.name: Invisible
invisible.description: Makes an object invisible for the duration of play while maintaining optional collision and proximity-based prompts. Can use object name or custom text for prompts.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text to show when player is near (leave blank to use object name)

properties.name: PROMPT_MODE
properties.description: Whether to show prompt text

properties.name: RANGE
properties.description: Distance at which prompt is shown

properties.name: COLLISION_MODE
properties.description: Whether to enable collision

steps: Set prompt text or leave blank

lut_changer.name: LUT Changer
lut_changer.description: Changes the Look-Up Table (LUT) when activated by a switch or trigger zone. Supports instant changes, fades, and incremental transitions with configurable timing and effects.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Message shown when LUT is changed

properties.name: LUT_GROUP
properties.description: LUT group to change to (without .png extension)

properties.name: TRANSITION
properties.description: Type of LUT change transition

properties.name: NUMBER_OF_INCREMENTS
properties.description: Number of incremental LUTs to use

properties.name: INCREMENT_DELAY
properties.description: Delay between increments in milliseconds

steps: Create or select a control object
Add LUT change sound to Sound0
Link to a switch or trigger zone

particle_mover.name: Particle Mover
particle_mover.description: Allows a particle effect to be attached to a moving object, maintaining its relative position and rotation. Perfect for creating dynamic particle effects that follow objects like engine exhaust, magic trails, or environmental effects.

properties.name: PARTICLE_NAME
properties.description: Name of the particle effect to move

properties.name: OBJECT_NAME
properties.description: Name of the object to attach the particle to

properties.name: ADJUST_X_OFFSET
properties.description: X-axis offset from the object's position

properties.name: ADJUST_Y_OFFSET
properties.description: Y-axis offset from the object's position

properties.name: ADJUST_Z_OFFSET
properties.description: Z-axis offset from the object's position

properties.name: HIDE_OBJECT
properties.description: Whether to hide the object the particle is attached to

lut_changer.name: LUT Changer
lut_changer.description: Creates a dynamic LUT (Look-Up Table) effect changer with multiple transition modes. Features instant, fade, and incremental transitions with configurable timing and sound effects.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when LUT effect is activated

properties.name: LUT_GROUP
properties.description: LUT group to change to (without .png extension)

properties.name: TRANSITION
properties.description: Type of transition when changing LUT

properties.name: NUMBER_OF_INCREMENTS
properties.description: Number of incremental steps for transition mode 3

properties.name: INCREMENT_DELAY
properties.description: Milliseconds between incremental changes

steps: Create an object to attach the behavior to
Set up incremental settings if needed
Link to trigger or switch for activation

scroller_control.name: Scroller Control
scroller_control.description: Controls texture scrolling effects with customizable movement in U and V directions. Features startup, running, and stopping phases with optional camera shake and teleportation effects.

properties.name: IMAGEFILE1
properties.description: Path to the texture file to scroll

properties.name: EMISSIVE_STRENGTH
properties.description: Emissive strength of the texture

properties.name: SCROLL_AMOUNT_U
properties.description: Amount to scroll in U direction (horizontal)

properties.name: SCROLL_AMOUNT_V
properties.description: Amount to scroll in V direction (vertical)

properties.name: SCROLL_DIRECTION
properties.description: Direction of texture scroll

properties.name: STARTUP_TIME
properties.description: Time to reach full scroll speed

properties.name: RUNNING_TIME
properties.description: Duration of continuous scrolling

properties.name: STOPPING_TIME
properties.description: Time to slow to a stop

properties.name: TELEPORTATION
properties.description: Whether to teleport at the end of scrolling

properties.name: SHUDDERS
properties.description: Camera shake effect timing

properties.name: ALWAYS_ON
properties.description: Whether the scroller is always active

properties.name: TELEPORT_EXIT_ANGLE
properties.description: Player exit angle upon teleport

features: Texture scrolling in U and V directions
Sound support for startup, running, stopping

add_fx.name: Add FX
add_fx.description: Adds various visual effects to a named object, including hovering, spinning, and glowing effects. Features customizable movement patterns, rotation speeds, and emissive properties.

properties.name: ObjectName
properties.description: Name of the object to apply effects to

properties.name: Hover
properties.description: Whether to enable hovering effect

properties.name: HoverHeight
properties.description: Maximum height of hover movement

properties.name: LowerHeight
properties.description: Minimum height of hover movement

properties.name: HoverSpeed
properties.description: Speed of hover movement

properties.name: Spin
properties.description: Whether to enable spinning effect

properties.name: SpinSpeed
properties.description: Speed of rotation

properties.name: spin_x
properties.description: Whether to spin on X axis

properties.name: spin_y
properties.description: Whether to spin on Y axis

properties.name: spin_z
properties.description: Whether to spin on Z axis

properties.name: AntiClockwise
properties.description: Whether to spin counter-clockwise

properties.name: Glow
properties.description: Whether to enable glowing effect

properties.name: EmmisiveStrength
properties.description: Strength of the emissive glow

properties.name: ActiveAtStart
properties.description: Whether effects are active by default (if unchecked, requires switch/zone activation)

properties.name: PulseGlow
properties.description: Whether to pulse the glow effect

properties.name: PulseSpeed
properties.description: Speed of glow pulsing

alarm.name: Alarm
alarm.description: Creates an alarm system that, when activated, plays a sound and alerts nearby enemies within a configurable range. Can be triggered by switches, zones, or other logic connections.

properties.name: PROMPT_TEXT
properties.description: Text displayed when alarm is triggered

properties.name: ALARM_RESET
properties.description: Time in seconds before alarm automatically resets

properties.name: ALERT_RANGE
properties.description: Range in units at which enemies will be alerted

steps: Attach the alarm behavior to an object
Set the ALERT_RANGE for enemy notification
Add your alarm sound to Sound0
Test the alarm by activating the trigger

atlas_changer.name: Atlas Changer
atlas_changer.description: Loops up to three atlas images onto an object with variable display times and loop delay. Can be activated from a trigger or switch or set to always on.

properties.name: IMAGEFILE1
properties.description: First image file to display in the cycle

properties.name: DISPLAY_TIME1
properties.description: Display duration for first image in seconds

properties.name: IMAGEFILE2
properties.description: Second image file to display in the cycle

properties.name: DISPLAY_TIME2
properties.description: Display duration for second image in seconds

properties.name: IMAGEFILE3
properties.description: Third image file to display in the cycle

properties.name: DISPLAY_TIME3
properties.description: Display duration for third image in seconds

properties.name: ATLAS_ROWS
properties.description: Number of rows in the atlas texture grid

properties.name: ATLAS_COLUMNS
properties.description: Number of columns in the atlas texture grid

properties.name: EMISSIVE_STRENGTH
properties.description: Brightness of the emissive texture effect

properties.name: LOOP_DELAY
properties.description: Delay in seconds between texture cycles

properties.name: ALWAYS_ON
properties.description: Whether the effect is always active

properties.name: DIAGNOSTICS
properties.description: Enable diagnostic text display
